(area_cell_count, area_cell_count).explanation: A variable cannot have a causal relationship with itself as they represent the same measurement;

(area_cell_count, time).explanation: Increasing the number of cells in a chip design directly increases the computational complexity and processing time required for synthesis, place-and-route, and simulation tools;

(area_cell_count, area_net_area).explanation: A higher number of cells in the design necessitates more interconnect wiring and routing resources, directly increasing the net area required for connections between cells;
